extension.description: Lite version of Bluetooth Delay addon.[CR]This addon lets you set a delay for your bluetooth headset, and easily toggle between delay on/off.[CR][CR]For easy toggle, set a shortcut on your skin's home screen, or set a shortcut key in the keyboard.xml file:[CR]For toggle - RunScript(script.bluetooth.delay)[CR]For speakers - RunScript(script.bluetooth.delay,0)[CR]For bluetooth - RunScript(script.bluetooth.delay,1)
extension.news: - Now you can set a delay even when the video is playing[CR]- The audio delay setting does not reset the subtitle delay value
